item.title: Why won`t these cases work!?
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:4, topic:186297”]on the second case try if(playerHasItemAmount(1779, 1) == false) instead.

on the first case try…

case 2646: //flax
actionTimer = 30;
startAnimation(827);
sendMessage(“You pick up some flax!”);
addItem(1779, 1);
break;[/quote]

No, it did not work. Thanks for trying though

item.title: Why won`t these cases work!?
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

I made these just a second ago, its to pick flax and to be able to spin in on a spinning wheel. But its not working.
-Mabye I didnt put it in the right spot in client.java? I dont know. Here are my 2 cases;

case 2646: //flax actionTimer = 30; startAnimation(827); sendMessage("You pick up some flax!"); addItem(1779, 1); actionTimer = 12; break;

case 2644: if(playerHasItemAmount(1779, 1)==false) { sendMessage("You do not have flax to be spinned!"); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(1779, 1)==true) { deleteItem(1779, GetItemSlot(1779), 1); startAnimation(894); sendMessage("You spin the flax into bow string!"); addItem(1777, 1); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[12]), 12); } break;[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2008, 09:45:48 AM[/size][hr]So whats wrong? Why wont the flax get picked when I click “pick flax”

Read full topic
